restaurants.name: Ducky Duck
restaurants.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.

facts: Broccoli contains more protein than steak.
Raspberries are a member of the rose family.
Potatoes were the first food planted in space.
Cucumbers are 95 percent water.
Pineapple plants can take two to three years to produce a fruit.
Cotton candy was created by a dentist.
Watermelon and bananas are berries, but strawberries are not!
Cashews grow on cashew apples.
Lemons float but limes sink.
The original carrots were purple and yellow, not orange.
The most expensive pizza in the world costs $12,000 dollars.
One fast-food burger can have meat from 100 different cows.
Ketchup used to be used as a medicine.
White chocolate isn’t chocolate.
Cheese is the most stolen food in the world.
One in four hazelnuts ends up in Nutella.
McDonald’s sells 2.5 billion hamburgers every year.
French fries originated in Belgium, not France.
Cauliflower comes in multiple colors.
Bad eggs will float.
Food tastes different when you’re flying.
Turkey consumes the most tea per person.
The Netherlands drinks the most coffee per person.
Nutritious food is more expensive than junk food.
Eskimos use refrigerators to stop their food from freezing.
Goat meat is the most popular meat.
There are more Indian restaurants in London than in Mumbai or Delhi.
Breakfast is not the most important meal of the day.
